definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.description: Schema elements which occur in multiple places and should be reused

repo_data.description: All information about a git repository instance. Can be used to create a new object.
repo_data.title: Git Repository

library_dir.title: Library's Root Directory
library_dir.descirption: Library's root directory. Repository's name is appended to it to form the full path

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Any additional information about the repository. Not used by the framework.

default_branch.title: Default Branch
default_branch.description: Name of the default branch, e.g. master or main

custom.title: Custom
custom.decription: Additional custom information - can be anything that is useful for further processing. Not used by the framework.

update.description: All information related to the update process of an authentication repository - updated repository and pulled commits
update.title: Update Data

changed.title: Change Indicator
changed.description: Indicates if the repository was updated or not (will be false if pull was successful, but there were no new commits)

event.title: Update Event
event.description: Update event type - succeeded, changed, unchanged, failed, completed

repo_name.title: Name
repo_name.description: Name of the repository whose update was attempted

error_msg.title: Error message
error_msg.description: Error message that was raised while updating the repository

auth_repo.description: All information about an authentication repository coupled with update details
auth_repo.title: Authentication Rpository with Update Details

data.description: All properties of the authentication repository. Can be used to instantiate the AuthenticationRepository
data.title: Authentication Repository

conf_directory_root.title: Configuration Directory's Parent Directory
conf_directory_root.description: Path to the direcotry containing the configuration directory. The configuration direcotry contain last_validated_commit file and its name is equal to _repo_name

out_of_band_authentication.title: Out of Banch Authentication
out_of_band_authentication.description: Commit used to check the authentication repository's validity. Supposed to be uqual to the first commit

hosts.description: A dictionary mapping host names to additional information about them.
hosts.title: Hosts

custom.title: Custom
custom.descirption: Any information required for futher processing. Not used by the framework

commits.description: Information about commits - top commit before pull, pulled commits and top commit after pull
commits.title: Commits

target_repos.description: Information about the authentication repository's target repositories, including the update details
target_repos.title: Target Repos

^.*$.description: Commit before pull, after pull and lists of new and unauthenticated commits belonging to the given branch
^.*$.title: Branch's Commits

new.description: A list of new authenticated commits (specified in target files of the authentication repository)

unauthenticated.description: New unauthenticated commits - additional commits newer than the last authenticated commit in case of repositories where unauthenticated commits are allowed

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Additional custom data. Not used by the framework.

transient.title: Transient
transient.description: Transient data is arbitrary data passed from one script execution to the next one. It is discarded at the end of the process

persistent.title: Persistent
persistent.description: Persistent data is arbitrary date passed from one script execution the next one and stored to disk (to a file called persistent.json directly inside the library root)

config.description: Additional configuration, loaded from config.json located inside the library root
config.title: Configuration Data
